column1: Annex table 18. Number of announced greenfield FDI projects, by sector/industry, 2003–2023
Source: UNCTAD, based on information from the Financial Times Ltd, fDi Markets (www.fDimarkets.com).

Note: Data refer to estimated amounts of capital investment. Definition and coverage of industries may be different from those of M&As and other FDI tables. They refer to the sector/industry of the project. Totals exclude the financial centres in the Caribbean.
